thread.title: Power Restored to Those Hit by Puerto Rico Blackout

author: wsjcom
title: Power Restored to Those Hit by Puerto Rico Blackout
text:
SAN JUAN, Puerto Rico—Electricity has been restored to all customers affected by an island-wide blackout, Puerto Rico’s power company said Thursday, but tens of thousands of families remain without normal service seven months after hurricanes Maria and Irma.
An excavator hit a transmission line, causing Wednesday’s blackout, which affected more than 1.4 million customers, the Puerto Rico Electric Power Authority said.
Before...
